title: Split Screen Van meeting: june 30 - july2, the Netherlands

posts.content:
The first VW Split screen van meeting in the Netherlands

Date: 30 june - 2 july 2006
Location: Camping 'de Schatberg', Sevenum.
Info: www.spijlbustreffen.nl



Starting on Friday June 30 until Sunday July 2, on camping ‘de Schatberg’ in Sevenum, the first international VW split screen van meeting will be organized in the Netherlands: ‘Splits at the lake’. A unique new event on the aircooled Volkswagen events calendar. The event location will be accessible for VW split screen vans from Friday 12:00 until Sunday 17:00. The planned meeting activities include: parts market, trunk barge sale, multiple workshops, split bus tour, party evening, etc. A professional valuer will be present on Saturday.
On Saturday visitors are welcome and there will be lots of VW split screen vans to admire and fanatic owners to meet. World Champion soccer matches can be viewed live on a big screen. During Saturday’s

party evening process will be handed out to the participant hat travelled the longest distance in his/her split bus, the owner of the ‘best of show’ split bus and the oldest present split bus.

The price per participating split bus is set to 35,- Euro, for 2 nights incl. 2 persons. To get a realistic idea of the number of participants a sign-up database is integrated in the meetings website:
www.spijlbustreffen.nl This website also contains shows detailed information about the meeting program, routes, plans, a FAQ, ect. Signed-up meeting participants will have the opportunity to win extra prices.
For more information have a look at www.spijlbustreffen.nl or contact the organization via e-mail:
Frank Meels: vwspijlbus@hotmail.com / Jan Bruins: vwzone@home.nl

Regards,
Frank Meels & Jan Bruins
www.spijlbustreffen.nl
this looks great!! i would defo fancy it if there were a convoy... anybody fancy it??
